abstract: Cogent, the maker of fingerprint-identification systems that is being acquired by 3M, received a buyout bid of more than $1 billion from NEC, according to court papers.
snippet: Cogent, the maker of fingerprint-identification systems that is being acquired by 3M, received a buyout bid of more than $1 billion from NEC, according to court papers.
lead_paragraph: Cogent, the maker of fingerprint-identification systems that is being acquired by 3M, received a buyout bid exceeding $1 billion from NEC, according to court papers, Bloomberg News reported.

headline.main: NEC Made Higher Bid for Cogent Before 3M Deal
